Topic.Title: I need some more help... heh :?

Posts.EditableText: I am planning to do a new game which I ALMOST finished. But, the thing is.. I tried to make an object to reveal another object. I also tried to put a text, but I decided not to anymore. It worked good before I tried to pu a text AND reveal the object. But after I tried, it dint worked anymore I did put it as before, but it dint worked. How shall I make it work again?
